name: cssobj
description: Light weight javascript library for rendering and diff CSS from javascript with CSSOM in browser, using virtual CSS technology. Features include: at media stylesheet rule response support for old browsers, localized class names, dynamic caculation and update css, hot replacement for css rules.

scripts.report: cd dist && gzip < cssobj.min.js > cssobj.min.gz && ls -lh && rm -f *.gz

author: James Yang <jamesyang999@gmail.com>
